inputSpec.name: stage-G0q44PQ433GYV97qKk0zkb4J.contaminants_txt
inputSpec.label: Custom contaminants
inputSpec.help: (Optional) A special file containing custom contaminant sequences to screen overrepresented sequences against. If left empty, a default set of contaminants that comes with the FastQC package will be used. If provided, this file must be a text file with two tab-delimited columns: name (such as 'Truseq Adapter') and DNA sequence (such as 'TATCTCGTATG').

inputSpec.name: stage-G0q44PQ433GYV97qKk0zkb4J.adapters_txt
inputSpec.label: Custom adapters
inputSpec.help: (Optional) A special file containing custom adapter sequences which will be explicity searched against the library. If left empty, a default set of adapters that comes with the FastQC package will be used. If provided, this file must be a text file with two tab-delimited columns: name (such as 'Nextera Transposase Sequence') and DNA sequence (such as 'CTGTCTCTTATA').

inputSpec.name: stage-G0q44PQ433GYV97qKk0zkb4J.limits_txt
inputSpec.label: Custom limits
inputSpec.help: (Optional) A special file containing a set of criteria which will be used to determine the warn/error limits for the various modules, or selectively remove some modules from the output altogether. For an example of a limits file, refer to the limits.txt file in the FastQC sources.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0q44PQ433GYV97qKk0zkb4J.kmer_size
inputSpec.label: Kmer size
inputSpec.help: The kmer size that the kmer analysis module will use. This module reports overrepresented k-mers (sequences of size 'k'). This size must be between 2 and 10 (default is 7).

inputSpec.name: stage-G0q44PQ433GYV97qKk0zkb4J.nogroup
inputSpec.label: Disable grouping of bases past 50bp?
inputSpec.help: Disable grouping of bases for reads >50bp. All reports will show data for every base in the read. WARNING: Using this option may cause fastqc to slow down or crash if used on really long reads, and resulting plots may be too large for practical viewing.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0q44PQ433GYV97qKk0zkb4J.extra_options
inputSpec.label: Extra command-line options
inputSpec.help: (Optional) Extra command-line options that will be passed directly to the fastqc invocation. Example: --nofilter.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0qpXy0433Gv75XbPJ3xj8jV.reads_fastqgzs
inputSpec.label: Reads
inputSpec.help: An array of files, in gzipped FASTQ format, with the first read mates to be mapped.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0qpXy0433Gv75XbPJ3xj8jV.reads2_fastqgzs
inputSpec.label: Reads (right mates)
inputSpec.help: (Optional) An array of files, in gzipped FASTQ format, with the second read mates to be mapped.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0qpXy0433Gv75XbPJ3xj8jV.rg_info_csv
inputSpec.label: Read group information
inputSpec.help: (Optional) A file, in CSV format, with each row describing RG tag information for each (pair) of read files in the following order: read_filename, RG ID, RG LB, RG PU. This file needs to cover and match all FASTQ filenames of "Reads" (reads_fastqgzs).

inputSpec.name: stage-G0qpXy0433Gv75XbPJ3xj8jV.genomebwaindex_targz
inputSpec.label: BWA reference genome index
inputSpec.help: A file, in gzipped tar archive format, with the reference genome sequence already indexed with BWA.

suggestions.name: DNAnexus Reference Genomes: Azure West US

inputSpec.name: stage-G0qpXy0433Gv75XbPJ3xj8jV.genome_fastagz
inputSpec.label: Reference genome FASTA file
inputSpec.help: A file, in gzipped format, with the reference genome sequence. Please make sure this is the same build as the one used above for the BWA reference genome index.

suggestions.name: DNAnexus Reference Genomes: Azure West US

inputSpec.name: stage-G0qpXy0433Gv75XbPJ3xj8jV.read_group_platform
inputSpec.label: Read group platform
inputSpec.help: This is a string (without spaces) describing the platform/technology used to produce the reads. The read group platform will appear in the read group information in the BAM file (as RG PL tag).

inputSpec.name: stage-G0qpXy0433Gv75XbPJ3xj8jV.sample
inputSpec.label: Sample ID
inputSpec.help: (Optional) A string (without spaces) describing the sample. This Sample ID will appear in the read group information in the BAM file (as RG SM tag) and in the sample information in the VCF file. The output files will be prefixed by this string. If not specified, the Sample ID will be set as the prefix of the FASTQ filename.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0qpXy0433Gv75XbPJ3xj8jV.stream_inputs
inputSpec.label: Stream Input Reads?
inputSpec.help: Selecting this option will stream in input FASTQ files and potentially speed-up the calcualtion. Default is true. Streaming the inputs may cause an input data access issue for very large FASTQ files, if that is the case, you should try rerunning the job with this option off.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0qpXy0433Gv75XbPJ3xj8jV.output_format
inputSpec.label: Output a BAM or a CRAM file?
inputSpec.help: Selecting "BAM" will create an output file in BAM format, while selecting "CRAM" will create an output file in CRAM format. Default is BAM.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0qpXy0433Gv75XbPJ3xj8jV.output_metrics
inputSpec.label: Calculate and output the BAM metrics?
inputSpec.help: Selecting this option will calculate and output the following metrics of the BAM file: Base Quality Score Distribution (QualDistribution), Insert Size Distribution (InsertSize), Alignment Statistics (AlignmentStat), GC Bias (GCBias and GCBiasSummary), Mean Base Quality Score per Sequencing Cycle (MeanQualityByCycle) and Deduplication. Default is false.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0qpXy0433Gv75XbPJ3xj8jV.output_md5sum
inputSpec.label: Calculate output md5sum
inputSpec.help: Calculate and output md5sum files for BAM, CRAM and VCF outputs

inputSpec.name: stage-G0qpXy0433Gv75XbPJ3xj8jV.mark_or_remove_duplicate
inputSpec.label: Mark or remove duplicated reads?
inputSpec.help: Selecting "mark_duplicate" will mark duplicated reads and keep all reads in the output BAM file. Selecting "remove_duplicate" will remove the duplicated reads. Default is mark duplicated reads. Selecting "none" will not perform any deduplication, which is recommended when using amplicon sequencing data.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0qpXy0433Gv75XbPJ3xj8jV.extra_bwa_options
inputSpec.label: Extra BWA Options
inputSpec.help: (Optional) Extra BWA options.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0qpXy0433Gv75XbPJ3xj8jV.bwa_nonverbose
inputSpec.label: Reduce BWA logs
inputSpec.help: Selecting this option will reduce the log messages from BWA; this may be useful when running with very large samples, to make sure that the log does not reach the size limit.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0qpXy0433Gv75XbPJ3xj8jV.bam_compression
inputSpec.label: Intermediate BAM compression
inputSpec.help: Compression of the intermediate BAM files. Using the default 1 will achieve the fastest processing, while selecting 6 or 9 will reduce the intermediate storage requirements at the expese of a slower processing.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0qpY1Q433GpzBp958KJYfBK.mappings_bam
inputSpec.label: Tumor Reads
inputSpec.help: The file containig the reads for the tumor sample.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0qpY1Q433GpzBp958KJYfBK.recal_table
inputSpec.label: Tumor Recalibration Table
inputSpec.help: (Optional) The corresponding recalibration table for the tumor sample if Base Quality Score Recalibration was already performed.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0qpY1Q433GpzBp958KJYfBK.normal_mappings_bam
inputSpec.label: Normal Reads
inputSpec.help: (Optional) The file containing the reads for the normal sample.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0qpY1Q433GpzBp958KJYfBK.normal_recal_table
inputSpec.label: Normal Recalibration Table
inputSpec.help: (Optional) The corresponding recalibration table for the normal sample if Base Quality Score Recalibration was already performed.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0qpY1Q433GpzBp958KJYfBK.genome_fastagz
inputSpec.label: Reference genome FASTA file
inputSpec.help: A file, in gzipped format, with the reference genome sequence. Please make sure this is the same build as the one used above for the BWA reference genome index.

suggestions.name: DNAnexus Reference Genomes: Azure West US

inputSpec.name: stage-G0qpY1Q433GpzBp958KJYfBK.gatk_resource_bundle
inputSpec.label: GATK resource bundle
inputSpec.help: (Optional) A bundle containing known SNPs, mutations and indels.

suggestions.name: Sentieon GATK Bundles: Azure West US

inputSpec.name: stage-G0qpY1Q433GpzBp958KJYfBK.targets_bed
inputSpec.label: Target coordinates
inputSpec.help: (Optional) A BED file with target coordinates. If given, processing will be restricted to only inside those coordinates. NOTE: Providing this coordinates has priority over the option of "Ignore the decoy regions". The variant calling will be within the regions provided.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0qpY1Q433GpzBp958KJYfBK.panel_of_normal_vcfgz
inputSpec.label: Panel of Normals
inputSpec.help: (Optional) A file, in bgzipped VCF format, containing the variants detected in the Panel of Normals analysis that will be used to remove false positives.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0qpY1Q433GpzBp958KJYfBK.germline_vcfgz
inputSpec.label: TNhaplotyper2 Germline VCF
inputSpec.help: (Optional) A file, in bgzipped VCF format, containing the population allele frequency. This file is only used with TNhaplotyper2

inputSpec.name: stage-G0qpY1Q433GpzBp958KJYfBK.ml_model
inputSpec.label: Machine Learning model for TNscope
inputSpec.help: (Optional) A model file that will be used to perform machine learning variant filtration after TNscope. When using this input you should set the corresponding special settings in the Extra TNscope Options.

suggestions.name: Sentieon TNscope Machine Learning Models: AWS US-east
Sentieon TNscope Machine Learning Models: AWS China-north
Sentieon TNscope Machine Learning Models: AWS Germany
Sentieon TNscope Machine Learning Models: Azure Amsterdam
Sentieon TNscope Machine Learning Models: AWS Sydney
Sentieon TNscope Machine Learning Models: Azure West US

inputSpec.name: stage-G0qpY1Q433GpzBp958KJYfBK.output_md5sum
inputSpec.label: Calculate output md5sum
inputSpec.help: Calculate and output md5sum files for BAM, CRAM and VCF outputs

inputSpec.name: stage-G0qpY1Q433GpzBp958KJYfBK.run_realign
inputSpec.label: Perfrom INDEL realignment on individual samples?
inputSpec.help: Selecting this option will perform individual INDEL realignment of the tumor and the normal sample before BQSR. This option is not recommended for Haplotype based callers such as TNhaplotyper2 or TNscope, but is provided for backward compatibility.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0qpY1Q433GpzBp958KJYfBK.run_bqsr
inputSpec.label: Perfrom Base Quality Score Recalibration?
inputSpec.help: Selecting this option will perform BQSR. This option will be ignored if you input a recalibration table.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0qpY1Q433GpzBp958KJYfBK.run_corealign
inputSpec.label: Perfrom INDEL co-realignment?
inputSpec.help: Selecting this option will perform INDEL realignment of the tumor and the normal sample after BQSR. This option is not recommended for Haplotype based callers such as TNhaplotyper2 or TNscope, but is provided for backward compatibility.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0qpY1Q433GpzBp958KJYfBK.ignore_decoy
inputSpec.label: Ignore the decoy regions (i.e. ignore the sponge regions for variant calling)?
inputSpec.help: Selecting this option will ignore the decoy regions (i.e. chromosomes w/ names as "hs37d5", "chrEBV", or "hs38d1") for variant calling, and will reduce the time cost performing the pipeline. NOTE: if the target coordinates BED file is provided, the applet will then only call variants within the target regions.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0qpY1Q433GpzBp958KJYfBK.somatic_algo
inputSpec.label: Which somatic algorithm to use?
inputSpec.help: Selecting "TNscope" will call variants using Sentieon TNscope, while selecting "TNhaplotyper2" will call variants using TNhaplotyper2, which is Sentieon implementation of GATK4 Mutect2. Default is TNscope.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0qpY1Q433GpzBp958KJYfBK.ML_THRESHOLD
inputSpec.label: Threshold for TNscope machine learning model
inputSpec.help: (Optional) Threshold for the probability that a variant is true according to the TNscope model. Tis input is ony relevant when using TNscope and inpputting a model.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0qpY1Q433GpzBp958KJYfBK.tnscope_driver_options
inputSpec.label: Extra TNscope driver Options
inputSpec.help: (Optional) Extra options that are driver-level parameters for the TNscope/TNhaplotyper2 algorithm.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0qpY1Q433GpzBp958KJYfBK.tnscope_algo_options
inputSpec.label: Extra TNscope Options
inputSpec.help: (Optional) Extra options that are algo-level parameters for the TNscope/TNhaplotyper2 algorithm.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0qpY1Q433GpzBp958KJYfBK.tnhapfilter_algo_options
inputSpec.label: Extra tnhapfilter Options
inputSpec.help: (Optional) Extra options that are algo-level parameters for the tnhapfilter algorithm.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0qpY1Q433GpzBp958KJYfBK.bam_compression
inputSpec.label: Intermediate BAM compression
inputSpec.help: Compression of the intermediate BAM files. Using the default 1 will achieve the fastest processing, while selecting 6 or 9 will reduce the intermediate storage requirements at the expese of a slower processing.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0gx0zQ433GkVKk6KBQjJ2f3.in
inputSpec.label: Input files
inputSpec.help: (Optional) Files to download to instance temporary folder before command is executed.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0gx0zQ433GkVKk6KBQjJ2f3.cmd
inputSpec.label: Command line
inputSpec.help: Command to execute on instance. View the app readme for details.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0gx0zQ433GkVKk6KBQjJ2f3.image
inputSpec.label: Optional Docker image identifier
inputSpec.help: (Optional) Instead of using the default Ubuntu 20.04 environment, the input command will be run using the specified Docker image as it would be when running 'docker run image cmd'. Example image identifiers are 'ubuntu:18.04', 'quay.io/ucsc_cgl/samtools'.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0gx0zQ433GkVKk6KBQjJ2f3.mount_inputs
inputSpec.label: Whether to use "dx-mount-all-inputs"?
inputSpec.help: (Optional) Whether to mount all files that were supplied as inputs to the app instead of downloading them to the local storage of the execution worker.

inputSpec.name: stage-G18JF28433GkzzVJ3Gk4199k.in
inputSpec.label: Input files
inputSpec.help: (Optional) Files to download to instance temporary folder before command is executed.

inputSpec.name: stage-G18JF28433GkzzVJ3Gk4199k.cmd
inputSpec.label: Command line
inputSpec.help: Command to execute on instance. View the app readme for details.

inputSpec.name: stage-G18JF28433GkzzVJ3Gk4199k.image
inputSpec.label: Optional Docker image identifier
inputSpec.help: (Optional) Instead of using the default Ubuntu 20.04 environment, the input command will be run using the specified Docker image as it would be when running 'docker run image cmd'. Example image identifiers are 'ubuntu:18.04', 'quay.io/ucsc_cgl/samtools'.

inputSpec.name: stage-G18JF28433GkzzVJ3Gk4199k.mount_inputs
inputSpec.label: Whether to use "dx-mount-all-inputs"?
inputSpec.help: (Optional) Whether to mount all files that were supplied as inputs to the app instead of downloading them to the local storage of the execution worker.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0KbXP0433GXJyYVFfQvqKQQ.reference_fasta
inputSpec.label: Reference Genome Sequence (FASTA)
inputSpec.help: The reference genome sequences in fasta format. App will accept compressed FASTA. REQUIRED

inputSpec.name: stage-G0KbXP0433GXJyYVFfQvqKQQ.mappings_files
inputSpec.label: Mappings BAM/Pindel file
inputSpec.help: BAM or Pindel input file(s) containing mappings you want to search for indels and structural variations. BAM files MUST have .bam extension AND either insert size or bam config file is required as additional input. REQUIRED.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0KbXP0433GXJyYVFfQvqKQQ.bam_config_file
inputSpec.label: BAM Configuration File
inputSpec.help:
If mappings were generated by BWA/MOSAIK, it is RECOMMENDED to input a bam configuration text file containing the names (names-ONLY, no path) of the BAM-files one wants to search for indels and structural variations. Pindel performance will be faster with config file. On each line, list the name of the bam-file, the insert size (length of sequence between the paired-end adapters in paired-end sequence), and the label for the sample. Example: 
tumor_sample.bam	250	TUMOR

inputSpec.name: stage-G0KbXP0433GXJyYVFfQvqKQQ.fasta_index
inputSpec.label: FASTA index (from samtools faidx)
inputSpec.help: The reference genome index generated by samtools. If not provided, app will use samtools create and return bam index files. RECOMMENDED

inputSpec.name: stage-G0KbXP0433GXJyYVFfQvqKQQ.bam_index_files
inputSpec.label: BAM Index File
inputSpec.help: If mappings are BAM files, provide a BAM index file for each mappings BAM file(s). BAM index file names must match BAM files (ex: file1.bam and file1.bam.bai). If not provided, app will sort (if assume_sorted is set to false) and index mappings BAM file, increasing runtime.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0KbXP0433GXJyYVFfQvqKQQ.breakdancer_calls_file
inputSpec.label: Breakdancer (or other SV) Calls File
inputSpec.help: Option to include calls from other SV methods such as BreakDancer to further increase sensitivity and specificity. BreakDancer result or calls from any methods must in the format: 'ChrA LocA stringA ChrB LocB stringB other'

inputSpec.name: stage-G0KbXP0433GXJyYVFfQvqKQQ.assume_sorted
inputSpec.label: Assume Sorted
inputSpec.help: If assume_sorted is set to false AND bam index files are not given as input, app will run samtools sort on input (computationally expensive)

inputSpec.name: stage-G0KbXP0433GXJyYVFfQvqKQQ.insert_size
inputSpec.label: Expected Average Insert Size
inputSpec.help: If no bam config file is provided as input to the app, app MUST be given an insert size (the length of sequence between the paired-end adapters in paired-end sequence) and app will automatically create a bam configuration file for pindel to use. If this bam was not produced by BWA, this option will be ignored.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0KbXP0433GXJyYVFfQvqKQQ.chromosome
inputSpec.label: Chromosome To Process

inputSpec.name: stage-G0KbXP0433GXJyYVFfQvqKQQ.bam_not_produced_by_bwa
inputSpec.label: BAM Not Produced by BWA
inputSpec.help: If set as true, sequence_platform MUST ALSO be set as input. Only set as true if a) BAM file was generated by either Illumina-PairEnd or Illumina-MatePair AND IF another aligner than BWA was used to generate bam file. The reads will be converted to pindel input format using sam2pindel.cpp. Sam2pindel expects a mapping location of mate read if the query is unmapped while the mate has been mapped. Users may need to fix the information about mate reads for some mappers such as bowtie.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0KbXP0433GXJyYVFfQvqKQQ.sequence_platform
inputSpec.label: Sequence Platform
inputSpec.help: If bam_not_produced_by_bwa is set to true, this input MUST be provided. Pindel's built in sam2pindel conversion takes as input sequence_platform information and supports only Illumina-MatePair or Illumina-PairEnd produced BAM files

inputSpec.name: stage-G0KbXP0433GXJyYVFfQvqKQQ.output_prefix
inputSpec.label: Output Prefix
inputSpec.help: Output Prefix. Default will be the name of the input file

inputSpec.name: stage-G0KbXP0433GXJyYVFfQvqKQQ.num_instances
inputSpec.label: Number of Instances
inputSpec.help: The number of subjobs Pindel can be split into. More threads assures lower runtime, but will spawn new instances. NOTE: If report_interchrom_events is True (default behavior) or only one chromosome or region is specified in 'chromosome' input, Pindel will only run on one instance regardless of input.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0KbXP0433GXJyYVFfQvqKQQ.num_threads_per_instance
inputSpec.label: Number of Threads
inputSpec.help: The number threads per instance that Pindel will run. More threads assures lower runtime but will not guarantee same results.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0KbXP0433GXJyYVFfQvqKQQ.export_vcf
inputSpec.label: Export as VCF
inputSpec.help: If true, Pindel will ALSO export short insertion, deletion, inversion, and tandem duplication variants as a single VCF file. Long insertion and break point files will be returned as Pindel files (not currently supported by pindel's VCF converter). NOTE: Export GATK Compatible VCF option must also be true if you wish to use VCF files with GATK tools.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0KbXP0433GXJyYVFfQvqKQQ.vcf_gatk_compatible
inputSpec.label: Export GATK Compatible VCF
inputSpec.help:
If TRUE, VCF will also be outputted and the -G (GATK) compatibility option will be used in the pindel2vcf converter and it's possible that this format is not compatible with other VCF-reading software. Also note that GATK requires genotypes to be 0/0, 0/1 or 1/1 instead of undefined, like ./1 or . ('not detected'). However, since pindel cannot yet genotype events (distinguish between 0/1 and 1/1) all events are called as 0/0 (not found) or 0/1, even while some may very well be homozygous alternative (1/1). 
If FALSE, the -G (GATK) compatibility option will not be used; while this allows Pindel to indicate the uncertainty in genotypes, and should be compatible with most software, this format will not be compatible with GATK pipelines and tools such as GATK ValidateVariants.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0KbXP0433GXJyYVFfQvqKQQ.report_long_insertions
inputSpec.label: Report Long Insertions
inputSpec.help: Report insertions of which the full sequence cannot be deduced because of their length

inputSpec.name: stage-G0KbXP0433GXJyYVFfQvqKQQ.report_read_pair
inputSpec.label: Report Discordant Read Pair
inputSpec.help: Search for discordant read-pair to improve sensitivity.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0KbXP0433GXJyYVFfQvqKQQ.report_close_mapped_reads
inputSpec.label: Report Close Mapped Reads
inputSpec.help: Report reads of which only one end (the one closest to the mapped read of the paired-end read) could be mapped

inputSpec.name: stage-G0KbXP0433GXJyYVFfQvqKQQ.report_only_close_mapped_reads
inputSpec.label: Return ONLY Close Mapped Reads
inputSpec.help: If true, Pindel will not search for SVs and only report reads of which only one end (the one closest to the mapped read of the paired-end read) could be mapped (the output file can then be used as an input file for another run of pindel, which may save size if you need to transfer files). Other files will be outputted as empty files.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0KbXP0433GXJyYVFfQvqKQQ.pindel_command_line
inputSpec.label: Pindel Advanced Command Line Options
inputSpec.help: If specified, pindel will run with the inputed options. App WILL input 'pindel -f <> -p <> -T <> -o <> [and/or -i <>] -r -t -l -k -s -S -I' according to app inputs. Users must input all OTHER command line options i.e. '-c <> -R <> -x <>'. Do not enter inputs already supplied by app.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0KbXP0433GXJyYVFfQvqKQQ.export_vcf_advanced_options
inputSpec.label: pindel2vcf Command Line Arguments
inputSpec.help: If provided, app will run pindel2vcf script with the command line arguments provided as input and export output as VCF file. If not provided, default options and reference genome file name will be used. Please see app page for more details on input parameters. (ex: "[-P -r -v -G inputs provided by app] -R <required name_and_version_of_reference_genome> -d <required date_of_reference_genome_version>  [-v -c -w -mc -he ... optional parameters]")

inputSpec.name: stage-G0Y8730433Gb8g1g71jQJBZQ.in
inputSpec.label: Input files
inputSpec.help: (Optional) Files to download to instance temporary folder before command is executed.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0Y8730433Gb8g1g71jQJBZQ.cmd
inputSpec.label: Command line
inputSpec.help: Command to execute on instance. View the app readme for details.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0Y8730433Gb8g1g71jQJBZQ.image
inputSpec.label: Optional Docker image identifier
inputSpec.help: (Optional) Instead of using the default Ubuntu 20.04 environment, the input command will be run using the specified Docker image as it would be when running 'docker run image cmd'. Example image identifiers are 'ubuntu:18.04', 'quay.io/ucsc_cgl/samtools'.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0Y8730433Gb8g1g71jQJBZQ.mount_inputs
inputSpec.label: Whether to use "dx-mount-all-inputs"?
inputSpec.help: (Optional) Whether to mount all files that were supplied as inputs to the app instead of downloading them to the local storage of the execution worker.

inputSpec.name: stage-G02ZFz0433GpQB4j9Gvg0b81.docker_image
inputSpec.label: static cgppindel docker image
inputSpec.help: cgppindel image tar

inputSpec.name: stage-G02ZFz0433GpQB4j9Gvg0b81.reference
inputSpec.label: reference genome
inputSpec.help: Reference genome file *.fa[.gz]

inputSpec.name: stage-G02ZFz0433GpQB4j9Gvg0b81.simrep
inputSpec.label: simple repeats
inputSpec.help: Tabix indexed simple/satellite repeats.

inputSpec.name: stage-G02ZFz0433GpQB4j9Gvg0b81.reference_index
inputSpec.label: reference genome index
inputSpec.help: Reference genome index file

inputSpec.name: stage-G02ZFz0433GpQB4j9Gvg0b81.simrep_index
inputSpec.label: simple repeats index
inputSpec.help: Tabix indexed simple/satellite repeats index file.

inputSpec.name: stage-G02ZFz0433GpQB4j9Gvg0b81.genes
inputSpec.label: gene bed file
inputSpec.help: Tabix indexed coding gene footprints.

inputSpec.name: stage-G02ZFz0433GpQB4j9Gvg0b81.unmatched
inputSpec.label: Panel of normals
inputSpec.help: Tabix indexed gff3 of unmatched normal panel

inputSpec.name: stage-G02ZFz0433GpQB4j9Gvg0b81.assembly
inputSpec.label: genome assembly version
inputSpec.help: Name of assembly in use - when not available in BAM header SQ line.

inputSpec.name: stage-G02ZFz0433GpQB4j9Gvg0b81.seqtype
inputSpec.label: Sequencing type
inputSpec.help: Sequencing protocol, options TG: targeted capture, WXS: whole exome, WGS : whole genome

inputSpec.name: stage-G02ZFz0433GpQB4j9Gvg0b81.filter
inputSpec.label: Output filter rules
inputSpec.help: VCF filter rules file

inputSpec.name: stage-G02ZFz0433GpQB4j9Gvg0b81.tumour
inputSpec.label: Tumour input bam
inputSpec.help: Tumour BAM file

inputSpec.name: stage-G02ZFz0433GpQB4j9Gvg0b81.tumour_index
inputSpec.label: Tumour input bam index
inputSpec.help: Tumour BAM file index

inputSpec.name: stage-G02ZFz0433GpQB4j9Gvg0b81.normal
inputSpec.label: Normal input bam
inputSpec.help: Normal BAM

inputSpec.name: stage-G02ZFz0433GpQB4j9Gvg0b81.normal_index
inputSpec.label: Normal input bam index
inputSpec.help: Normal BAM index

inputSpec.name: stage-G0Y87ZQ433Gy6y7vBB74p30j.in
inputSpec.label: Input files
inputSpec.help: (Optional) Files to download to instance temporary folder before command is executed.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0Y87ZQ433Gy6y7vBB74p30j.cmd
inputSpec.label: Command line
inputSpec.help: Command to execute on instance. View the app readme for details.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0Y87ZQ433Gy6y7vBB74p30j.image
inputSpec.label: Optional Docker image identifier
inputSpec.help: (Optional) Instead of using the default Ubuntu 20.04 environment, the input command will be run using the specified Docker image as it would be when running 'docker run image cmd'. Example image identifiers are 'ubuntu:18.04', 'quay.io/ucsc_cgl/samtools'.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0Y87ZQ433Gy6y7vBB74p30j.mount_inputs
inputSpec.label: Whether to use "dx-mount-all-inputs"?
inputSpec.help: (Optional) Whether to mount all files that were supplied as inputs to the app instead of downloading them to the local storage of the execution worker.

inputSpec.name: stage-G0KbB6Q433GyV6vbJZKVYV96.input_bam
inputSpec.label: Input BAM file
inputSpec.help: The ID of an 'unrefined' BAM file for contamination checking

inputSpec.name: stage-G0KbB6Q433GyV6vbJZKVYV96.input_bam_index
inputSpec.label: Index of input BAM
inputSpec.help: The index file corresponding to the input BAM file

inputSpec.name: stage-G0KbB6Q433GyV6vbJZKVYV96.vcf_file
inputSpec.label: A vcf file containing the SNPs used to calculate contamination
inputSpec.help: Select the vcf that corresponds to the correct genome build, GRCh37 or GRCh38

inputSpec.name: stage-Fy0549Q41zg02Kjg05x69yvK.sorted_bam
inputSpec.label: Sorted Mappings
inputSpec.help: An input BAM file for deduplicating and/or Picard Tools QC suites

inputSpec.name: stage-Fy0549Q41zg02Kjg05x69yvK.fasta_index
inputSpec.label: Reference FASTA index archive
inputSpec.help: A gzipped tarball containing the reference genome files genome.fa, genome.fa.fai and genome.dict.

inputSpec.name: stage-Fy0549Q41zg02Kjg05x69yvK.bedfile
inputSpec.label: Bedfile used to calculate HS metrics
inputSpec.help: Choose manufacturer's bed file (for the enrichment kit) whose coordinates will be used to calculate the selection metrics.

inputSpec.name: stage-Fy0549Q41zg02Kjg05x69yvK.run_CollectMultipleMetrics
inputSpec.label: Choose whether to run Picard CollectMultipleMetrics
inputSpec.help: Specifically, run CollectAlignmentSummaryMetrics, CollectInsertSizeMetrics, QualityScoreDistribution, MeanQualityByCycle, CollectBaseDistributionByCycle, CollectGcBiasMetrics, CollectQualityYieldMetrics. See https://gatk.broadinstitute.org/hc/en-us/articles/360037594031-CollectMultipleMetrics-Picard-

inputSpec.name: stage-Fy0549Q41zg02Kjg05x69yvK.run_CollectHsMetrics
inputSpec.label: Choose whether to run Picard CollectHsMetrics
inputSpec.help: Collects hybrid-selection (HS) metrics for a SAM or BAM file. https://gatk.broadinstitute.org/hc/en-us/articles/360037591891-CollectHsMetrics-Picard-

inputSpec.name: stage-Fy0549Q41zg02Kjg05x69yvK.run_CollectTargetedPcrMetrics
inputSpec.label: Choose whether to run Picard CollectTargetedPcrMetrics
inputSpec.help: Calculate PCR-related metrics from targeted sequencing data. https://gatk.broadinstitute.org/hc/en-us/articles/360037225812-CollectTargetedPcrMetrics-Picard-

inputSpec.name: stage-Fy4j4K041zgF5Z8y0x9KjV55.quantize_labels
inputSpec.label: optional quantize labels
inputSpec.help: List of comma seperated labels for bins if using --quantize, number of labels must match number of bins. If none are given the defaults from the readme are passed.

inputSpec.name: stage-Fy4j4K041zgF5Z8y0x9KjV55.bam
inputSpec.label: BAM file
inputSpec.help: BAM file to generate bp coverage on

inputSpec.name: stage-Fy4j4K041zgF5Z8y0x9KjV55.index
inputSpec.label: Index file
inputSpec.help: Index of BAM

inputSpec.name: stage-Fy4j4K041zgF5Z8y0x9KjV55.bed
inputSpec.label: bed file
inputSpec.help: BED file to generate regions.bed

inputSpec.name: stage-Fy4j4K041zgF5Z8y0x9KjV55.qual_flags
inputSpec.label: Quality flags
inputSpec.help: Optional remove duplicate and multi mapped reads using --flag 1796 --mapq 20. Default: True

inputSpec.name: stage-G02ZG6Q433GV76v29b6Gggjp.mosdepth_files
inputSpec.label: Array of files output from mosdepth.
inputSpec.help: Array of eggd_mosdepth output files, uses per base bed and reference build txt file.

inputSpec.name: stage-G02ZG6Q433GV76v29b6Gggjp.thresholds
inputSpec.label: String of comma seperated thresholds at which to calculate coverage

inputSpec.name: stage-G02ZG6Q433GV76v29b6Gggjp.name
inputSpec.label: Sample name, used in report and for naming output files

inputSpec.name: stage-G02ZG6Q433GV76v29b6Gggjp.limit
inputSpec.label: Number of genes at which to skip full gene plot generation, for large panels this may take a long time.

inputSpec.name: stage-G02ZG6Q433GV76v29b6Gggjp.panel
inputSpec.label: Display panel
inputSpec.help: Display panel(s) / gene(s) from name of panel bed file. Default: True

inputSpec.name: stage-G02ZG6Q433GV76v29b6Gggjp.snps
inputSpec.label: SNP VCFs to check coverage for

inputSpec.name: stage-G02ZG6Q433GV76v29b6Gggjp.summary
inputSpec.label: Report summary
inputSpec.help: Display summary of genes / transcripts in report in summary section. Default: False

outputSpec.name: stage-G0q44PQ433GYV97qKk0zkb4J.report_htmls
outputSpec.label: html fastqc reports (1 per input fastq)

outputSpec.name: stage-G0q44PQ433GYV97qKk0zkb4J.stats_txts
outputSpec.label: txt fastqc stats (1 per input fastq)

outputSpec.name: stage-G0qpXy0433Gv75XbPJ3xj8jV.mappings_bam
outputSpec.label: Sorted mappings with duplicate marked/removed
outputSpec.help: A coordinate-sorted BAM file with the resulting mappings.

outputSpec.name: stage-G0qpXy0433Gv75XbPJ3xj8jV.mappings_bam_bai
outputSpec.label: Sorted mappings with duplicate marked/removed index
outputSpec.help: The associated BAM index file.

outputSpec.name: stage-G0qpXy0433Gv75XbPJ3xj8jV.metrics
outputSpec.label: Reads stats metrics
outputSpec.help: An array of files containing statistical summaries of the data quality.

outputSpec.name: stage-G0qpXy0433Gv75XbPJ3xj8jV.md5sums
outputSpec.label: MD5 sum files for most outputs
outputSpec.help: An array of files containing the md5sum files for BAM, CRAM and VCF outputs.

outputSpec.name: stage-G0qpY1Q433GpzBp958KJYfBK.variants_vcf
outputSpec.label: Variants
outputSpec.help: The genotyped variants in VCF format.

outputSpec.name: stage-G0qpY1Q433GpzBp958KJYfBK.variants_vcftbi
outputSpec.label: Variants index
outputSpec.help: The associated TBI file.

outputSpec.name: stage-G0qpY1Q433GpzBp958KJYfBK.md5sums
outputSpec.label: MD5 sum files for most outputs
outputSpec.help: An array of files containing the md5sum files for BAM, CRAM and VCF outputs.

outputSpec.name: stage-G0gx0zQ433GkVKk6KBQjJ2f3.out
outputSpec.label: Output files
outputSpec.help: (Optional) New files that were created in temporary folder.

outputSpec.name: stage-G18JF28433GkzzVJ3Gk4199k.out
outputSpec.label: Output files
outputSpec.help: (Optional) New files that were created in temporary folder.

outputSpec.name: stage-G0KbXP0433GXJyYVFfQvqKQQ.inversions
outputSpec.label: Pindel Detected Inversions
outputSpec.help: Output will be empty IF report_inversions (app input) is set to false

outputSpec.name: stage-G0KbXP0433GXJyYVFfQvqKQQ.tandem_duplications
outputSpec.label: Pindel Detected Tandem Duplications
outputSpec.help: Output will be empty IF report_duplications (app input) is set to false

outputSpec.name: stage-G0KbXP0433GXJyYVFfQvqKQQ.large_inserts
outputSpec.label: Pindel Detected Large Insertions
outputSpec.help: Output will be empty IF report_long_insertions (app input) is set to false

outputSpec.name: stage-G0KbXP0433GXJyYVFfQvqKQQ.breakpoints
outputSpec.label: Pindel Detected Unassigned Breakpoints
outputSpec.help: Output will be empty IF report_breakpoints (app input) is set to false

outputSpec.name: stage-G0KbXP0433GXJyYVFfQvqKQQ.close_mapped_reads
outputSpec.label: Pindel Detected Close Mapped Reads
outputSpec.help: Output will be empty UNLESS report_close_mapped_reads or report_only_close_mapped_reads (app input) is set to true

outputSpec.name: stage-G0KbXP0433GXJyYVFfQvqKQQ.vcf
outputSpec.label: Pindel Variants (VCF)
outputSpec.help: If true, VCF will be outputed in addition to pindel outputs. Currently pindel2vcf converter does not support large inserts and breakpoint file conversions.

outputSpec.name: stage-G0KbXP0433GXJyYVFfQvqKQQ.sortedbam_and_index_files
outputSpec.label: Sorted BAM Index Files
outputSpec.help: If app sorts and indexes BAM files, will upload BAM Index(es) [and sorted BAM(s) if assume_sorted=False] to platform for use in future analyses.

outputSpec.name: stage-G0Y8730433Gb8g1g71jQJBZQ.out
outputSpec.label: Output files
outputSpec.help: (Optional) New files that were created in temporary folder.

outputSpec.name: stage-G0Y87ZQ433Gy6y7vBB74p30j.out
outputSpec.label: Output files
outputSpec.help: (Optional) New files that were created in temporary folder.

outputSpec.name: stage-G0KbB6Q433GyV6vbJZKVYV96.verifybamid_out
outputSpec.label: verifyBamID output files
outputSpec.help: verifyBamID contamination statistics, read depth distribution and log file

outputSpec.name: stage-Fy0549Q41zg02Kjg05x69yvK.eggd_picard_stats
outputSpec.label: Picard stats files
outputSpec.help: The generated statistics files
